definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: lean, lay, rest, support (NH id.; Ph. in n. pr. Lzb:317, 329; Aram. [[סְמַח]], smak; also Eth. (samaka) 0asmaka: cause to lean upon, etc. Di:335; Ar. samaka is be high, ascend, raise, uplift, samkun roof;—

definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: lean or lay hand upon ([[עַל־]]): Am 5:19; elsewh. in sacred rite: on head of sacrif. victim, as those who share in sacrif., Ex 29:10, Ex 29:15, Ex 29:19, Le 1:4 + 12 t. Lv, Nu 8:12 (all P), 2Ch 29:23; so of Levites, presented to ´[[י]] Nu 8:10 (P); on head of blasphemer Le 24:14 (P; as witnesses of his guilt); on head of Joshua in consecration (Moses subj.) Nu 27:18, Nu 27:23, De 34:9 (all P).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: intrans. Ps 88:8 thy wrath hath rested upon me ([[עָלַי]]); also [[סָמַךְ]] [[מֶלֶח־בָּבֶל אֶל־]] Ez Eze 24:2 hath leaned against, rested his weight upon, Jerusalem, i.e. invested (Toy), begun the siege of it. †

support, uphold, sustain, only fig.: c. 2 acc. Ge 27:37 (J) with corn and must have I sustained him, provided sustenance for him, cf. (of ´[[י]]) Ps 51:14; uphold Egypt Ez Eze 30:6; abs. Is 63:5; esp. of ´[[י]] upholding, sustaining Is 59:16, Is 63:5, Ps 3:6, Ps 37:17, Ps 37:24, Ps 54:6 (on [[בְּ]] essentiae v. Ges:§ 119 i, [[בְּ]] supr.

definitions.title: 7 a
definitions.body: ), Ps 119:116, Ps 145:14; so pt. pass. Ps 111:8 they are sustained, i.e. maintained (´[[י]]'s commands), [[סָמוּח לִבּוֹ]]) Ps 112:8 his heart is sustained, firm, and so ´[[יֵחֶר ס]] Is 26:3. †

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. 1 S. [[נִסְמַ֫כְתִּי]] Ps 71:6; 3 pl. [[נִסְמָָכוּ]] Is 48:2; Impf. [[יִסָּמֵךְ]] 2Ki 18:21, Is 36:6, [[וַיִּסָּמֵח]] Ju Jdg 16:29; 3 mpl. [[וַיִּסָּֽמְכוּ]] 2Ch 32:8; —reflex. support, or brace oneself, also c. [[עַל־]]:Ju Jdg 16:29 and he braced himself against (upon) them (the pillars); 2Ki 18:21 (if) a man support himself on it (Egypt as a cracked reed) = Is 36:6; on cheering words 2Ch 32:8; on God Is 48:2, Ps 71:6. †

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Imv. mpl. sf. + [[בְּ]] instr,: [[סַמְּכוּנִי]] Ct So 2:5 sustain (refresh, revive) me with raisin-cakes.
